law.text: No person under eighteen (18) years of age can make any will, except in pursuance of a power specially given to that effect, and except also, that a parent, though under eighteen (18) years of age, may by will appoint a guardian for his child.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 86, effective June 21, 1974. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4826.
